item.title: Samsung SmartThings Hub
item.description: Finally bought myself a Smartthings hub at Lowes. Nice price too - $79. The plan is to integrate some custom sensor designs and have a Bone Black or Raspi3 to act as man in the middle to the Smartthings Hub. Want to read more about me?

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to my awesome blog! There’s not much yet, stay tuned!
